metadata.title: CVE-2023-6688 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.2. A problem with the processing logicfor Google Chat Messages integration may lead to a regular expression DoSattack on the server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
